job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.description: An exciting opportunity with a technology platform catered for data-driven decision-making. About the role: Working with a team of experienced engineers who work to turn ideas into business wins. Help with everything in the team from Data ETLs to model serving to test reporting. A typical day will include data science modelling, data cleaning, ETL and analytics. Requirements: Experienced with big data processing - Apache Spark, SQL and Scala Competent using search technologies – Lucene / Soir Extensive Python knowledge and application Hands on experience with gradient boosted trees (XGBoost & MML) and deep learning (TensorFlow & Keras) Bachelors or higher degree in Computer Science from a top university Minimum 3 years’ experience of programming work experience At least 1 year of Data Science, Data Engineering or Machine Learning Experience Benefits: Competitive salary Comprehensive health insurance 401 (k) retirement plan Paid company holidays and unlimited PTO
